front.title: The EIPIP Protocol: a Pip engine with an EIP shell

abstract.t: In this memo, we present an internet protocol called 'EIPIP'. EIPIP is basically a protocol with a Pip engine and an EIP shell; it has the full capacity of Pip and all the desirable properties of EIP. We discuss the modifications required to the current Internet systems, the support for old IP hosts, deployment plan and implementation experience.
